visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a line chart with the title 'Website Traffic Data'. The x-axis should display categories for each day of the week from Monday to Friday. The y-axis should have a title 'Number of visitors'. The data series should include one series named 'visitors' with the data points [523, 619, 798, 630, 754]. The chart should have custom styling for axes and labels, including specific colors and font sizes. Additionally, the chart should include accessibility features such as a value description format for each data point.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a line chart titled 'Website Traffic Data'. The x-axis displays categories for each day of the week from Monday to Friday, while the y-axis is titled 'Number of visitors'. The data series includes one series named 'visitors' with specific data points. The chart features custom styling for axes and labels, with defined colors and font sizes to enhance readability. Additionally, the chart includes accessibility features, such as a value description format for each data point, ensuring that the chart is accessible to all users. The legend is enabled with custom styling, and the chart includes options for exporting and disabling credits.
